name: Go|No-Go Checklist for an application.txt - Introduction
description: This section introduces a document that outlines the necessary checkpoints or requirements that need to be met before launching or going live with a service. It aims to provide a comprehensive checklist to ensure that all critical aspects are reviewed and verified before proceeding with the service deployment.
use_cases: Ensuring readiness for service launch or go-live
Maintaining a standardized process for service releases

name: Go|No-Go Checklist for an application.txt - Checklist
description: This section outlines a checklist of requirements and best practices for deploying an application. It covers aspects such as the base image, graceful shutdown handling, performance testing, resource limits, logging, health checks, database integration, secret management, and DNS configuration. The checklist aims to ensure the application is secure, efficient, and follows industry standards.
